sourcesContent:
<template>
    <header class="top-bar">
      <input type="text" v-model="searchQuery" placeholder="🔍 Search bookmarks..." />
      <button @click="$emit('addBookmark')">+ Add Bookmark</button>
      <button @click="$emit('toggleDarkMode')">🌙 Dark Mode</button>
    </header>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    props: ["searchQuery"],
    emits: ["addBookmark", "toggleDarkMode"]
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .top-bar {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 15px;
    background: #fff;
  }
  </style>
